getPoliciesForAsset(uint8,uint256).details: NEW: Public view function to get all insurance policies for a specific asset.

params._assetTokenId: The token ID of the asset.
params._policyType: The type of asset (Vessel or Cargo).

returns._0: An array of InsurancePolicyNFT token IDs.
